verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
My hallelujah belongs to You
My hallelujah belongs to You
My hallelujah belongs to You
My hallelujah belongs to You

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
You deserve it
You deserve it
You deserve it
You deserve it
You deserve it
You deserve it
You deserve it
You deserve it

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
We say, all the glory (all the glory)
All the honour (all the honour)
All the praise (all the praise)

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Hallelujah (hallelujah)
Hallelujah (hallelujah)
Hallelujah (hallelujah)
Hallelujah (hallelujah)
Hallelujah (hallelujah)
Hallelujah (hallelujah)
Hallelujah (hallelujah)
